Author: lromor_
Content: Interesting! You made a dedicated instruction for those? Are you supporting IEEE 754 floats?

Author: polyfractal
Content: Yep, sorta! My processor is a transport-triggered architecture, so it's relatively easy to bolt on additional functional units (just adds a new move destination/result to the bus). iirc the tanh is set to use Q1.15 fixed point, and I think the MAC is just simple wrapping integer (edit: yep)

Content: those particular FUs got basically zero testing and were thrown in the last week, so dunno if they work ğŸ¤· ğŸ˜…
